name: Dead Mist V1
description:
The Story: Your Traped in a Hospital Thats Full Of Psychos and zombies try to unlock weapons and also. dont die..

(Keyboard and Mouse support on Apk) X NO CONTROLLER YET X

Future updates: Pc support (in Works) Better graphics Sniper Rifle New coin Better art Elevater For levels (maybe) Console support

Also wont and probably never release on PS4 or the consoles

Gameplay was recorded on bluestacks or pc!
